fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are in the game, all Town roles are replaced with Sentry roles of the same subalignment (or support if the subalignment doesnt exist in sentries).
- Whichever role you become gains the ability "Once per game, declare someone invalid, killing them with an overkill attack."
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid the town of any dissidents to the Sentries.

desc:
Post 5087
*My role has been declared invalid, sentries for everyone!*
